name: Big brother
description:
The idea behind big brother was through watching too many peak oil documentaries. The leaders of the world have a tight grip on the planet and they aren't going to let go any time soon. We're on a slow decline, which is going to hit us like nothing before. Our dependency on oil is absolutely ridiculous, without it were back in the stone age practically, and considering most kids grow up thinking food is produced at places like Tesco our future generations may be in for a bit of surprise. 

A4 piece of art.

name: Flightless
description:
I've an obsession with owls and I've come up with this illustration of one using a dot technique to accent the shades of the feathers. Time taken for the original inking process was around 12hrs.

Thank you very much for looking and if you're buying a piece then thank you very much and I hope you'll love the artwork as much as I loved creating it! :)

Owls are unable to move their eyes within their sockets to a great extent, which means they must turn their entire head to see in a different direction. Because owls have forward-facing eyes, they have well-developed binocular vision. Contrary to popular myth, an owl cannot turn its head completely backwards. It can turn its head 135 degrees in either direction; it can thus look behind its own shoulders, with a total 270-degree field of view

name: The Celt
description:
The Idea behind the Celt was to create an abstract interpretation of an old Celtic soul. I've spent 2 years of my life living in Ireland now and I thought it was high time to get some of that harp onto paper. 

This is an A4 Print, there's option for framed and unframed. 

Thank you very much for looking and if you're buying a piece then thank you very much and I hope you'll love the artwork as much as I loved creating it! :)

"For the creation of a masterwork of literature two powers must concur, the power of the man and the power of the moment, and the man is not enough without the moment." - Matthew Arnold
